ABSU  
  
   (iv) RENAISSANCE and PAUL require five (5) ’O’ level credit 
passes at not more than two (2) sittings including English 
Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and Biology.  
(v) EBSU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Physics, Chemistry , Mathematics and any other 
Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or 
Agricultural Science.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i)  EBSU requires Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or  
Biology.
